## Running the model

Open the run simulations.R script

1. Be sure to close the inputs file or RStudio will be unable to load it.
1. Go to tools and install packages from the archive fiel optoin and select the most recept zip file of the model.
2. You may see a banner at the top of the screen that indicates some depenent packages you need to install. Select yes to enable installation.
*
3. set numtrials to a value. 100 tends to be good. More values can take longer because of the stochasticity in the model.
4. set date. This can be in any format, it's just for your abiltyt to name and control the versions of the model you have run. 
5. Load the scnearios into the tab 
6. Starting with line 18 is the code that actually runs the model. (for each scnenario)
7. Results savled out to a csv.
